"Our Inner Demons":
"The urge to kill that drives me to battle...
I keep wondering what it could be.
Knowing this, the administrator gave me
this mission.
The history of ARKS is a tale told in
conflict...
Maybe I'll learn something from fighting
at your side.
Leader, take our Partner Cards and let
us accompany you into battle."
